name: wenlive.fun
description: Wenlive provides free, open access to decentralized streaming for any creator with a Solana wallet â€” no KYC, no platform lock-in, and no gatekeeping. It lowers the barrier for global creators to earn on-chain and reach new audiences. Key infrastructure like token-gating, stream metadata, and referral tracking will be open-sourced to support other Solana-based creator tools. Wenlive strengthens the creator economy and promotes censorship-resistant, community-owned media on Solana.
